name: Christmas Alone by Janejro
description:
WARNING! There are loud sounds and jumpscare in the game

A small child was left alone at home over Christmas. Your parents said they'd be back before Jesus was born, so you're waiting for them. You also have an idea to make a Santa trap, but is it a good idea?

Feel the amazing atmosphere of this game that...

- It was made on Unity by a twelve-year-old child

- It was done in less than two days

- And it was the first 3D game of the developer.

Be warned the game is short and hardcore people can beat it in a minute
